franckcondon documentation¶

Contents:

About¶

This package contains classes for calculating Franck-Condon progressions involving 1 or more vibrational modes and fitting them to experimental data.

The calculation is based on the equation found in (for example) this paper, which says that:

\[I_{PL}(E)\propto n^3E^3\sum_{(m_i)}\left\{\left(\prod_{i}\frac{S_i^{m_i}e^{-S_i}}{m_i!}\right)\Gamma\left[E-\left(E_0-\sum_{i}m_iE_i^{vib}\right)\right]\right\}\]

Where \(n\) is refractive index, \(i\) indexes the vibrational modes, \(m\) indexes the vibrational sublevels, \(S_i\) are Huang-Rhys parameters, \(E_0\) is the energy of the 0-0 transition, \(E_i^{vib}\) are the energies of the vibrational modes and \(\Gamma\) is the lineshape function, taken here to be gaussian. Note that \((m_i)\) refers to all possible permutations of the \(m_i\).
